about_the_game:
Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by Emerald Coast Australia.

This pack contains:
- Emerald Coast Beryl Paint
- Emerald Coast Ocean Paint
- Emerald Coast Blue Gum Paint
- Emerald Coast Vanilla Paint
- Emerald Coast Cadmium Paint
- Emerald Coast Eucalyptus Spray
- Emerald Coast Terrazzo Spray
- Emerald Coast Australis Spray
- Emerald Coast Brushed Malachite Metal
- Emerald Coast Eucalyptus Wood
- Emerald Coast Tidal Camo
- Emerald Coast Tectonic Camo
- Emerald Coast Auscam Camo
- Emerald Coast Premium Wrap

The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.

The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.
